import React from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../StyleSheets/AboutPageStyle.css'; export default function AboutSections() { return (
What are food allergies?

An immune system reaction soon after eating a trigger food. Even a tiny amount of of the allergen can cause signs and symptoms such as digestive problems, hive, swollen airways, or overall inflammation.

Why I created this site

Having food allergies and a restricted diet, I find myself and a few of my friends like me having more difficulty finding recipes and more worries when going out to eat.

In the age of the internet, we are so fortunate to have more resources at our disposal! But most often, recipe sites contain all recipes and MAY mention alternatives for common ingredient allergies.

With my love for cooking, I wanted to help others and myself save the extra time it takes to comb through regular recipes in hopes for great alternatives and share allergy-friendly diets with my friends and family.

) }
